publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-2962 Brian Adam: AFS Alcohol Support Online—That the Parliament congratulates Alcohol Focus Scotland and Alcohol Support Ltd, Aberdeen, on launching a new pilot online support service for the people of Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire, AFS Alcohol Support Online, which can be found at www.alcoholsupport.co.uk, and believes that this interactive website will form a valuable tool in the range of services that are provided to help those who wish to talk to someone about their or another person’s drinking and will reduce barriers to gaining free and confidential advice from trained counsellors for those who live in rural areas, young people and disabled people.
S3M-2962 AFS Alcohol Support Online (lodged on 25 November 2008) Jamie Hepburn*, Alex Neil*

S3M-2962 Brian Adam: AFS Alcohol Support Online—That the Parliament congratulates Alcohol Focus Scotland and Alcohol Support Ltd, Aberdeen, on launching a new pilot online support service for the people of Aberdeen and Aberdeenshire, AFS Alcohol Support Online, which can be found at www.alcoholsupport.co.uk, and believes that this interactive website will form a valuable tool in the range of services that are provided to help those who wish to talk to someone about their or another person’s drinking and will reduce barriers to gaining free and confidential advice from trained counsellors for those who live in rural areas, young people and disabled people. Supported by: Jamie Hepburn, Alex Neil

S3M-2962 AFS Alcohol Support Online (lodged on 25 November 2008) John Wilson*, Bashir Ahmad*, Rob Gibson*, Bob Doris*, Kenneth Gibson*, Richard Baker*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Alasdair Allan*, Dave Thompson*, Aileen Campbell*, Bill Kidd*, Christina McKelvie*
S3M-2962 AFS Alcohol Support Online (lodged on 25 November 2008) Willie Coffey*, Robin Harper*, Sandra White*, Stuart McMillan*
S3M-2962 AFS Alcohol Support Online (lodged on 25 November 2008) Roseanna Cunningham*
S3M-2962 AFS Alcohol Support Online (lodged on 25 November 2008) Angela Constance*
